sentences.sentence: Ah, so you’ve come to ask about my schedule, huh?
Well, I’m here every evening during the week, Monday and Thursday afternoons too, and all weekend.
I work the late shifts, keeping the shop running. You’ll usually find me here.
Some of the other guys, they only show up during regular hours, but I’m always working when the others are off.
I like to keep busy, you know. The shop never stops.
So, if you need to find me, this is where I’ll be, just about any time you need.
